title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Situated Learning for Entrepreneurial Leadership Development Among Mid-Level Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of leadership and basic understanding of organizational operations
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze constraints in real work environments and design entrepreneurial leadership approaches
Learners enhance their ability to propose innovative opportunities through reflective dialogues with peers
Learners can recognize and practice leadership behavior changes based on authentic situational learning experiences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
